author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- used AI tool to help convert from boost test to catch2.
- renamed files to explicitly show they use catch2.
- moved all tests into one test executable.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Test passes.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1427
title: Convert many tests to use catch2 in DataFormat/Common
